mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Byker Wall is a long, unbroken block of 620 maisonettes in the Byker district of Newcastle upon Tyne, England. The new housing block was designed by Ralph Erskine assisted by Vernon Gracie. Design began in 1968 and construction took place between 1969 and 1982. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Byker_Wall [work]
